Package game.dinosaur

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaur.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
Implements a Dinosaur class that extends from actor.
Version:
6.1.0
Author:
Tim Jordan, Enoch Leow
See Also:
Actor, Counter, Behaviour

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> behaviours
    An Array list containing Behaviour objects that denote the different behaviours dinosaur do
    protected int breedingHealth
    HP threshold when dinosaur can breed
    protected Counter canBreed
    Cooldown timer for when dinosaur can breed again
    protected java.util.HashMap<Actor,​Counter> dinosaurAttackers
    Hashmap of other dinosaurs who have attacked this dinosaur
    protected int hungryHealth
    HP threshold when dinosaur is hungry
    protected int mateTime
    Dinosaur mating cooldown amount
    protected Counter matureCounter
    Countdown until baby dinosaur matures
    protected int maxunconsciousTime
    Max time dinosaur can be unconscious until it dies
    protected int maxWater
    Dinosaur Max water capacity
    protected Counter pregTime
    Dinosaur pregnancy timer before they can lay the egg
    protected Counter unconsciousTime
    Counter which records how long dinosaur has been unconcious
    protected int water
    Dinosaur current water level

      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Actor
      displayChar - the character that will represent the Actor in the display
      hitPoints - the Actor's starting hit points

    • Dinosaur

      public Dinosaur​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, java.lang.Boolean baby, char gender)
      Constructor for dinosaur
      Parameters:
      name - name of actor
      displayChar - a char denoting display character
      hitPoints - an int denoting dinosaur's hit points
      baby - a boolean denoting if the dinosaur initialised should be a baby version
      gender - a char denoting the gender of the dinosaur

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Runs the Dinosaurs functionality and behaviours each turn
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      an Action describing what the dinosaur does in the round

    • addAttacker

      public void addAttacker​(Dinosaur dinosaur)
      Adds a dinosaur into the hash map of dinosaurs actors that have attacked this dinosaur
      Parameters:
      dinosaur - a Dinosaur object that has attacked this dinosaur

    • isCurrentlyTimedOut

      public boolean isCurrentlyTimedOut​(Actor dinosaur)
      returns true if the given dinosaur is able to attack this dinosaur. Else, false
      Parameters:
      dinosaur - a Dinosaur object
      Returns:
      a boolean denoting if the dinosaur has attacked this dinosaur

    • getAttackTimeoutCounter

      protected abstract Counter getAttackTimeoutCounter()
      create's and gets a counter for the specific dinosaur's attack timeout
      Returns:
      a Counter of attack timeout

    • resetMateTime

      public void resetMateTime()
      Resets the counter in which the dinosaur is able to breed

    • unconsciousCheck

      public boolean unconsciousCheck​(GameMap map)
      checks if unconscious time has run out, and if true, kills the dinosaur and creates a corpse and returns true. if unsconciousTime is still over 0, returns false If it rains, Dinosaur gets revived
      Parameters:
      map - map in which the dinosaur is in
      Returns:
      a boolean true if dinosaur is still unconscious. false if dinosaur is dead

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Gets all the allowable actions that can be done to the dinosaur
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      an Actions object denoting the allowable actions

    • growUp

      protected abstract void growUp()

    • setBabyAttributes

      protected abstract void setBabyAttributes()

    • addBehaviours

      public void addBehaviours()
      Adds all the behaviours of dinosaur

    • drink

      public void drink​(int points)
      Add water points to the current Actor's water total. This cannot take the water over the Actor's maximum. If there is an overflow, water are silently capped at the maximum. Does not check for consciousness: unconscious Actors can still be healed if the game client allows.
      Parameters:
      points - number of water to add.

    • thirst

      public void thirst​(int points)
      To reduce water level on dinosaur If the Actor's water level goes down to zero, it will be knocked out (by making its health 0).
      Parameters:
      points - number of water points to deduct.

    • getEgg

      public Item getEgg()
      Gets the Egg from the dinosaur
      Returns:
      Item egg

      public void setPregTime()
